annotation: Peer bridge-node triggered escalate for bridge_settlement_results_total (23.83× baseline, delta 139.00) after 1 samples – executing the governance escalation playbook with labels [asset=eth, reason=ok, result=success].
response_sequence: Escalate the bridge remediation to governance for peer bridge-node on metric bridge_settlement_results_total.

Review Grafana panels: bridge_liquidity_burned_total (5m delta), bridge_liquidity_locked_total (5m delta), bridge_liquidity_minted_total (5m delta), bridge_liquidity_unlocked_total (5m delta), bridge_remediation_ack_latency_seconds (p50/p95), bridge_remediation_action_total (5m delta), bridge_remediation_dispatch_ack_total (5m delta), bridge_remediation_dispatch_total (5m delta), bridge_remediation_spool_artifacts, bridge_settlement_results_total (5m delta).
Open or update the governance incident as outlined in docs/operations.md#incident-response and copy the annotation into the record.
Audit remediation persistence at /remediation/bridge and dispatch status via /remediation/bridge/dispatches.
Coordinate cross-chain liquidity fallback and monitor until metrics return to baseline before closing the governance item.
